Introduction

Ryu Sion is a South Korean singer under HOMe. She is a member of the girl group Geenius and a former member of the trainee team Bebez. She is best known for participating in Mnet's reality survival show Girls Planet 999.

She is the older sister of ADYA's Yeonsu.
